mapper.select: select distinct t_artist.nm, t_album.album_img, t_album.album_ttl, t_artist.grop_id, t_album.album_id from t_artist_tracks, t_artist, t_tracks, t_album where t_artist.grop_id = t_artist_tracks.grop_id and t_artist_tracks.track_id = t_tracks.track_id and t_album.album_id = t_tracks.album_id and rownum <= 6 order by DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE

select distinct al.album_img, al.album_id, a.debut_dt from t_album al, t_artist a where a.debut_dt >= to_date('2000-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.debut_dt < to_date('2010-12-31', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and rownum <= 8 order by DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE

select a.debut_dt, a.grop_img, c.cd_nm, a.grop_id from t_artist a, t_artist_tracks at, t_tracks t, t_code c where a.debut_dt >= to_date(#{startDate}, 'yyyy') and a.debut_dt < to_date(#{finishDate}, 'yyyy') and at.grop_id = a.grop_id and at.track_id = t.track_id and c.cd_no = t.genre_cd and c.cd_nm = #{genreName} order by DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE
